pr_title: Expose the merge.scheduler.max_thread_count setting for non-SSD type disks

timeline.bodyText:
I think this will be a bit problematic since the value depends on the environment where the test is running on. E.g. on our CI systems it will be lower.
Maybe we can make the assertion a bit more lenient in that regard or fix the value in the create table statement, so that the tests are deterministic on all environments?
timeline.author: mfussenegger
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -96,6 +96,7 @@ public void testBuildCreateTableColumns() throws Exception {
                      "   \"mapping.total_fields.limit\" = 1000,\n" +
                      "   max_ngram_diff = 1,\n" +
                      "   max_shingle_diff = 3,\n" +
+                     "   \"merge.scheduler.max_thread_count\" = 4,\n" +

replies.bodyText: Right, I will fix this value.
replies.author: asdf2014

timeline.message: Expose the merge.scheduler.max_thread_count setting for non-SSD type disks
